text:
[Verse]
Colors in the air
Shining everywhere
Life's a picture show
Where should we go

[Verse 2]
Neon lights at night
Glow is outta sight
Dancing through the haze
Lost in this maze

[Chorus]
Life in Technicolor
Bright and like no other
Feel the rhythm flow
Let the colors grow

[Verse 3]
City's heartbeat loud
Lost among the crowd
Rhythm sets us free
Come and dance with me

[Verse 4]
Blues and reds collide
Feel the world outside
Every hue and shade
In this light parade

[Chorus]
Life in Technicolor
Bright and like no other
Feel the rhythm flow
Let the colors grow
title: Life in Technicolor
